name: Stop the Dumb Heroes (Rykasi)
description:
Stop the Dumb heroes is a tower defense game in which, at the behest of a lich, you must drive the heroes out of your dungeon. This is a week-long project made for Weekly Game Jam.

LICH: "These stupid heroes! Why the hell do they promptly come to my house to pick up treasures? I've been gathering this money for a long time, I need new curtains.
YOU, deal with these heroes, I'll call the guys, but do you organize them, okay?"

Made by:

- Vitor Estevam (Programming) - @vitorstvm

- João Lucas "Rykasi" (Art) - @jo.lukaz
